title: Chiefs-Chargers MNF Recap, Latest on Kaepernick, Biggest Overachievers/Underachievers (Football 11/19)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Chiefs victory over the Chargers on Monday Night Football (:30). The guys analyze Philip Rivers' struggles, if there should be concern in Kansas City and issues with the field in Mexico City. Next, the Pick Six Superfriends discuss Myles Garrett appealing his suspension (30:30), if Matt Nagy should be believed regarding Mitch Trubisky (33:00) and what the Panthers should do at QB (38:45), before dissecting the latest with Colin Kaepernick (45:00). Finally, who are the biggest overachieving and underachieving teams in the NFL this season (56:00)?
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
